    • Method Detail

      • findAndSetupPlugins

        public static void findAndSetupPlugins()
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads all plugins annotated with Plugin found by the client and plugin class loader.
        This method should only be called once ever.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • registerEventClass

        public static void registerEventClass(java.lang.Object instance)
        Registers a class that contains EventCallback annotated methods, and maps those methods correctly.
        This method must only be called within Plugin.Setup or in a constructor/initializer of a plugin.
        Parameters:
        instance - an instance of a class containing EventCallback annotated methods

      • callEvent

        public static void callEvent(Event event)
        Propagates an Event to its event listeners.
        Parameters:
        event - an instance of Event

      • activatePlugins

        public static void activatePlugins()
        Activate all plugins.
        Attempts to activate plugins from the directory. If the plugin is toggleable then it will add a new item to the settings panel.

      • activatePlugin

        public static boolean activatePlugin(PluginContainer plugin)
                              throws java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                                     java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Activate a specific plugin
        Safely invokes (PluginContainer.activateMethod) of all loaded plugins. If the plugin fails to activate the settings toggle will be disabled.
        Parameters:
        plugin - what we are activating
        Returns:
        true if success
        Throws:
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException

      • deactivatePlugins

        public static void deactivatePlugins()
        Deactivate all plugins.

      • deactivatePlugin

        public static void deactivatePlugin(PluginContainer plugin)
        Deactivate a specific plugin
        Safely invokes (PluginContainer.deactivateMethod) of all loaded plugins.
        Parameters:
        plugin - what we are deactivating

      • refreshPlugins

        public static void refreshPlugins()
        Refresh all plugins.
        Safely invokes (PluginContainer.refreshMethod) of all loaded plugins.
